languages.text: Each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is increased by +10% until the end of the combat. This effect resets after any attack made on the wearer. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15% dodge against {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}.
languages.original_text: Каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} до конца боя прибавляет +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g}. Когда владельца атакуют, эффект обнуляется. Базовое свойство {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g}: +15% к уклонению от {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}дистанционных атак{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Each round the wielder`s dodge is increased by +10% until the end of the combat. Reset after any attack is being made on a wielder. Base armour property: +15% dodge against ranged attacks.
Each round the wearer`s dodge is increased by +10% until the end of the combat. This effect resets after any attack made on the wearer. Base Armour Property: +15% dodge against ranged attacks.

Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15% dodge against {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}.

This effect resets after any attack made on the wearer. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15% dodge against {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Каждый раунд до конца боя прибавляет +10% к уклонению. Когда владельца атакуют, эффект обнуляется. Базовое свойство брони: +15% к уклонению от дистанционных атак.
Каждый раунд до конца боя прибавляет +10% к уклонению. Когда владельца атакуют, эффект обнуляется. Базовое свойство брони: +15% к уклонению от дистанционных атак.

languages.text: 每一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}，装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}都会提高10%，效果持续至战斗结束为止。如果装备者受到攻击，则此加成{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}重置。 基础{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}特性：对抗{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}远程{/g}攻击时，闪避+15%。
languages.original_text: Each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is increased by +10% until the end of the combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} resets after any attack made on the wearer. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15% dodge against {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks.

traits.locale_text: 每一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}，装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}都会提高10%，效果持续至战斗结束为止。如果装备者受到攻击，则此加成效果重置。 基础{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}特性：面对远程攻击时，闪避+15%。

languages.text: Cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} del portador aumenta un +10 % hasta el final del combate. El efecto se reinicia cuando el portador sufre un ataque. Propiedad de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} básica: +15 % de esquiva contra {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ataques a distancia{/g}.
languages.original_text: Each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is increased by +10% until the end of the combat. This effect resets after any attack made on the wearer. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15% dodge against {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} la {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} del portador aumenta un +10 % hasta el final del combate. El efecto se reinicia cuando el portador sufre un ataque. Propiedad de {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} básica: +15 % de esquiva contra ataques a distancia.

languages.text: 毎{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}、戦闘終了まで着用者の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}が+10%増加する。この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}は、着用者が攻撃を行うとリセットされる。 基本{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}特性：{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}攻撃に対して回避 +15%
languages.original_text: Each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is increased by +10% until the end of the combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} resets after any attack made on the wearer. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15% dodge against {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks.

traits.locale_text: 毎{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}、戦闘終了まで着用者の{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}が+10%増加する。この効果は、着用者が攻撃を行うとリセットされる。 基本{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}特性：遠隔攻撃に対して回避 +15%

languages.text: Jede {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} verbessert sich das {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} des Trägers bis zum Ende des Kampfes um +10 %. Dieser Effekt wird bei Angriffen auf den Träger zurückgesetzt. Grundeigenschaft {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}: +15 % Ausweichen gegen {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}Fernkampf-Angriffe{/g}.
languages.original_text: Each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is increased by +10% until the end of the combat. This effect resets after any attack made on the wearer. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15% dodge against {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Jede {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} verbessert sich das {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} des Trägers um +10% bis zum Ende des Kampfes. Dieser Effekt wird bei jeglichen Angriffen auf den Träger zurückgesetzt. Grundeigenschaft {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g}: +15% Ausweichen gegen Fernkampf-Angriffe.

languages.text: À chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} de l'utilisateur augmente de +10 % jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cet effet est réinitialisé après toute attaque portée contre l'utilisateur. Propriété d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de base : +15% d'esquive contre les {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}attaques à distance{/g}.
languages.original_text: Each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is increased by +10% until the end of the combat. This effect resets after any attack made on the wearer. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15% dodge against {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: À chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, l'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} de l'utilisateur augmente de +10 % jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cet effet se réinitialise après toute attaque portée contre l'utilisateur. Propriété d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} de base : +15%  d'esquive contre les attaques à distance.
